name: Краска для волос Garnier Color Naturals тёмный каштан 3
ingredients: Aqua/water, cetearyl alcohol, propylene glycol, deceth-3 laureth-12, ammonium hydroxide, oleth-30, lauric acid, hexadimethrine chloride, glycol distearate, polyquaternium-6, ethanolamine, silica dimethyl silylate, p-phenylenediamine, ci 77891/titanium dioxide, 2,4-diaminophenoxyethanol hcl, m-aminophenol, ascorbic acid, sodium metabisulfite, olea europaea oil/olive fruit oil, dimethicone, pentasodium pentetate, n,n-bis(2-hydroxyethyl)-p-phenylenediamine sulfate, carbomer, resorcinol parfum/fragrance.
